text: @realDonaldTrump Good idea. While other countries are taking porportionate precautions against the Coronavirus to protect it's citizens *to the extent of telling people to avoid close contact of any kind*... you're packing thousands of Americans into enclosed stadiums to stroke your own ego.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
